I finally figured out how to switch back and forth between images -- so I can be Saruman in one post and Eragon in another!

The trick is to give them keywords (which I hadn't bothered to.) Then, in Deepest Sender, hit Post Options, look at the bottom and you're given options for which picture to use. Snazzy!

I'm looking for suggestions for a new design for ANM (my website, currently offline, see post below.)

What I'm trying to do is a sort of techno-type design -- a bit spiffier and fancier than what I've got. I don't want to do a premade-template thingy, but I will take suggestions of what it should look like. I was trying just a simple box theme but that wasn't really. . .well. . .what I wanted. I'm sort of bored with the conventional  sidebar/navbar design, although I definitely like my current design, I think the web needs some stuff that's a bit more interesting and innovative. Especially just box designs or table designs -- sorta boring.

My older and fancier designs were bad on readability and on dialup users. . .so I decided to go simple -- which I still want anyway -- but maybe a tiny bit less simple!!
